The photo is doctored: The expert's verdict states that the photo in question is a manipulated image that combines separate photos of Jeffrey Epstein and Donald Trump. This aspect was employed to verify the authenticity of the claim.
Lack of credible sources: The expert's verdict mentions that the claim was made by an account on social media without providing any credible sources or evidence to support it. This aspect was considered to assess the credibility of the claim.
Denial of rape claims: The expert's verdict highlights that Donald Trump vehemently denied the rape claims made against him by an unnamed plaintiff in 2016. This aspect was used to evaluate the veracity of the claim.
Disassociation from Epstein: The expert's verdict mentions that Donald Trump distanced himself from Jeffrey Epstein, stating that he had not spoken to him in 15 years and was not a fan of his. This aspect was taken into account to verify the claim's accuracy.
